name: The Dart Avoider
description:
Game about avoiding "arrows". Bullet Hell. Multiple rooms and random one too!

>> Best played in fullscreen.

>> Warning: This game can be hard.

>> Crouch + Jump = Smaller jump (Essential for some rooms).

>> You can also access menu by pressing "Q". (HTML only, Esc would put you out of fullscreen.)

This game was made for Mini Jam 100: Overload, it was my sixth Game Jam. The theme was "Overload" and limitation was "Chaos is everything". All rooms are possible (8th is random).

Everything in the game is created by me in limit of 3 days.

Reviews and suggestions are welcomed!

By: RabbitDev
